titles.title: JP376 I Will Wave My Hands

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will wave my hands in praise and adoration,
I will wave my hands in praise and adoration,
I will wave my hands in praise and adoration,
Praise and adoration to the living God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He's given me hands that just love clapping:
One, two, one, two, three,
And He's given me a voice
That just loves shouting:
'Hallelujah!'
He's given me feet that just love dancing:
One, two, one, two, three,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And He's put me in a being
That has no trouble seeing
That whatever I am feeling
He is worthy to be praised.
